name: Wheel Of Fortune (itch) (Eleonora, MysticMia, Hudson Miears, Andrei Zi Zhen)
name_original: Wheel Of Fortune (itch) (Eleonora, MysticMia, Hudson Miears, Andrei Zi Zhen)
description:
Summary

Wheel Of Fortune is a game where you visit a magical fortune teller so you can revisit your past to fix your present. The game is made for the Brackeys Game Jam August 2020.

Screenshots

Controls

Move character with wasd,  jump with space and shoot with the mouse!

Credits

The game is made by Andrew ZiZhen, Eleonora Ivanova, Hudson Miears and Mia Beecham.

You can find us on YouTube
